Title: Ayal Jeevichiruppundu
Actors: Vijay Babu, Manikandan R. Achari, Namrata Gaikwad, Sudheer Karamana
Plot: Murugan is a poor illiterate fisherman residing in a small coastal village whose biggest dream is to visit Goa. John Mathew Mathan, a renowned writer catches his attention and together they go on a journey through Goa.
